title: The Root Schema
description: The root schema comprises the entire JSON document.

@odata.context.title: The @odata.context Schema
@odata.context.description: The @odata.context variable is required for odata.metadata=minimal and above, and tells the user where the results came from.

value.title: OData value array
value.description: OData responses return their values in an array.

items.title: Data System Items
items.description: Each item represents a potential data system configuration.

kind.title: The Kind Schema
kind.description: The kind of object a consumer of the service can expect.

name.title: The Name Schema
name.description: The name of the resource that can be retrieved from the data system.

url.title: The Url Schema
url.description: The URL for this resource, which may either be absolute or relative to the service root.
